title: Official release
description:
ContraBOT notifies your server of game changes on four different games and also notifies you of current free game deals.
ContraBOT can check the price of any given game on AllKeyShop. You can also add any game to your wishlist and contraBOT will notify you if that game reaches your wanted price on AllKeyShop.

title: Patch notes
description: contraBOT now is able to notify servers of its patch notes

title: Add to wishlist when checking a game's price
description: You can now directly add a game to your wishlist when cheking its price using a single click.
